Uses of Interface
com.cyc.kb.Relation

  • Packages that use Relation 
    Package Description
    com.cyc.kb
    Interfaces for manipulating CycL-based java objects, both for the purpose of making assertions and for retrieving terms and values via simple queries.
    com.cyc.kb.spi
    All KB API service provider interfaces.

    • Uses of Relation in com.cyc.kb

      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  BinaryPredicate
      The interface for KbPredicates that take exactly two arguments.
      interface  KbFunction
      The interface for Cyc functions.
      interface  KbPredicate
      The interface for Cyc predicates.
      Methods in com.cyc.kb that return Relation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Relation Relation.addArgGenl(int argPos, KbCollection col, Context ctx)
      creates a new Fact stating that col must be a generalization of any object in the argPos position of this relation, in the context.
      Relation Relation.addArgGenl(int argPos, String colStr, String ctxStr)
      creates a new Fact stating that col must be a generalization of any object in the argPos position of this relation, in the context ctx.
      Relation Relation.addArgIsa(int argPos, KbCollection col, Context ctx)
      creates a new Fact stating that any object in the argPos position of this relation should be an instance of the Collection col, in the context ctx.
      Relation Relation.addArgIsa(int argPos, String colStr, String ctxStr)
      creates a new Fact stating that any object in the argPos position of this relation should be an instance of the Collection col, in the context ctx.
      Relation Relation.addInterArgDifferent(Integer argPosM, Integer argPosN, Context ctx)
      Add a new interArgDifferent condition of this relation.

      Find or create a Relation object named nameOrId.
